Text:
Since no one else commented figured I would make an account and leave one. 

Torrent works great. Video is near perfect considering it wasn't filmed with the best cameras. Audio is great with English subtitles.

Thanks!

THANK YOU!!! My god I've waited for this! It never aired anywhere near me, so I am so grateful for this. Cheers!

srkfan, thank you for your generous gift.

This 2013 Oscar Nominated Documentary, along with, another Oscar Nominated Documentary, "The Gatekeepers" from 2012, expose the War-Mongering, Right Wing Extremist, Israelis, that use Abrahamic Religion Mythology, to justify their Bloodthirsty Invasion and Oppression of the land of Palestine.

The Gatekeepers Documentary is one created by an Israeli Filmmaker interviewing 6 members of Israeli Secret Service, "Shin Bet".

Israelis exposing and criticizing the Fanatical Desert Cut-Throats, that cause Untold Human Suffering to the Indigenous People of Palestine.

If anybody can find this documentary and post it, it would be greatly appreciated.

Is is listed as, "The Gatekeepers 2012".

Thnx, to ALL Truthseekers !!!

Thnx to the uploader! Movie was OK as i expected it to be! Storyline is intelligent and entertaining and acters were OK! I usually watch all the movies at film.raeshashop.com because they have HD's but they didn't have this one so im happy to have piratebay :) Good torrent quality - A9 V9,
